### Lua Language Highlight
```
local turbo = require("turbo")
local HelloWorldHandler = class("HelloWorldHandler", turbo.web.RequestHandler)
function HelloWorldHandler:get() self:write("Hello World!") end
turbo.web.Application({ {"/hello", HelloWorldHandler} }):listen(8888) turbo.ioloop.instance():start()
```
